job.title: Front-End Software Engineer (Early Career)
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brApples Identity Management engineering team is building number of web applications and platform solutions that works across multiple platforms iOS OS X Web We work on many highimpact projects that serve various Apple lines of business In this FrontEnd Software Engineer position you will be working with a team of software engineers that are building cutting edge fast and interactive web applications that incorporate the best user experience patterns and technologies available You will work with some of the coolest people and technologies on the planet including OS X iOS JSON restful web services and web platform technologies including Spring Apache and morebrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brWeb applications development experiencebrbrStrong knowledge of JavaScript JQuery AJAX OOJS JS MVC frameworksbrbrExperience with datadriven web development including strong knowledge of HTML5 DHTML and CSS3brbrFrontend development experience in JavaJ2EE application environments preferably using MVC architecturesbrbrSignificant experience developing and implementing UIFrontend for high volume web applicationsbrbrExperience in developing secure web applications and knowledge of application vulnerabilities such as Cross Site Scripting XSS Cross Site Request Forgery CSRF etcbrbrExperience with templating libraries like Mustache and HandlebarsbrbrExperience in Crossbrowser development and troubleshootingbrbrExtensive use of APIs and a strong understanding of HTTP and REST architecturebrbrKnowledge of design patterns enterprise architecture and software engineering principlesbrbrGood communication and personal skills ability to interact and work well with members of other functional groups in a project team and a strong sense of project ownershipbrbrVery good experience in Scrum and Agile methodologiesbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brJoin Apples Identity Management engineering team as a FrontEnd Software Engineer where you will help build innovative enterprise software applications You will have development and implementation experience of large scale highdemand applicationsbrbrbrYour responsibilities will include all aspects of software development from design and analysis to development implementation and maintenance You are a dedicated and hardworking individual As a frontend software engineer you will be a contributing member of a team that implements new product features improves existing product features while adding performance and software quality metrics to our codebase You will work closely with business partners other engineering teams quality assurance management as well as human interface and user experience designersbrbrbrResponsibilitiesbrbrArchitect creative products and innovate new technologies amp solutions play a handson development and design role and deliver product in a rapid and dynamic environmentbrbrYou will work closely with design team and technical team to define new user interface behaviors widgets and containers helping create a truly distinctive and extraordinary user experiencebrbrCollaborate with peers on technical design work estimation and implementation of new UI features including visualization aspects and server interfacescontractsbrbrWork with project managers and technical teams in a multifunctional environment to implement quality products that meet the business goalsbrbrQuickly build new ideas to get user feedbackbrbrContinually improving software development processes and practicesbrbrThis challenging position will require a selfstarter who can effectively manage numerous projects simultaneously meet daring deadlines and who thrives in a dynamic environment You can expect a highprofile position on a phenomenal team with many challenges and rewardsbrbrFlexible and works well as part of a fastpaced product development teambrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS or MS in Computer Science related fieldbrbr
